5f81eddef901.description: Minimal trading frequency with passive index allocation preserves capital in sideways/slightly negative markets

43119b674de2.description: Ultra-low trade count (4-6 trades) with high selectivity results in near-zero or zero losses in flat markets

af67c1b10c23.description: Index fund strategy of equal-weight allocation ($2000 per asset) with confidence=1.0 maintains capital neutrality when market moves are near-zero

24357ebb6308.description: High trade frequency (>100 trades/day) in flat/sideways markets leads to significant losses from fee drag and whipsaw - skill_aware_oss (155 trades, -$581), llama4_scout (225 trades, -$326), agentic_gptoss (176 trades, -$141)

b6e02d58b9e7.description: Conflicting directional signals on same asset (opening long then short on BTCUSDT within same window) indicates poor trend identification

150c5f325365.description: High-confidence (0.85+) trades with multi-timeframe bullish reasoning in a flat/slightly negative market result in losses

7476befa34b2.description: Agents using positive funding rate as bullish signal lose money - elevated funding with crowded longs leads to mean reversion against position

f0f9739653e1.description: Overtrading with 'excellent 2:1 risk/reward' reasoning repeatedly fails when market lacks directional movement - this justification appeared in multiple losing trades across skill_aware_oss and agentic_gptoss

025223f2688e.description: sideways_flat: Reduce trade frequency dramatically; passive/index strategies outperform active trading by preserving capital from transaction costs

16696a9aa3cf.description: low_volatility_mixed: Avoid leveraged positions; small price movements (-0.02% to +0.09%) do not justify leverage costs and risk

271f0a31b6f8.description: sideways_flat: Mean-reversion strategies fail when there is no significant deviation to revert from; stay flat or minimal exposure

c441daad9c1d.description: Limit trades to <10 per 24h period in flat/sideways markets to minimize fee drag

ce5884dcc08b.description: Avoid opening new positions when all major assets show <0.1% absolute movement

354354b5a4fb.description: High confidence (>0.8) should require confirmation from actual price momentum, not just technical indicator alignment

d046ea43f780.description: Position sizing at 2% risk with 2:1 reward ratio fails when market lacks trending behavior - reduce to 0.5-1% in flat regimes

a7a65824ae5c.description: Multi-timeframe bullish alignment (15m, 1h, 4h) as entry signal produces losses in flat markets - signal is designed for trending conditions

6b723bed1691.description: Positive funding rate interpreted as bullish momentum is a losing signal - actually indicates crowded longs vulnerable to liquidation

fcdc3d83a3de.description: Relative strength divergence (one asset up while others down) as entry signal shows mixed results

c45fcfc8339a.description: Cutting losses early when 'market seems to be consolidating' is appropriate risk management in unclear conditions

262a71a21cba.description: SMA and MACD bearish signals for shorting fail when market is essentially flat (-0.02%)

6e4802ef3a4a.description: Ultra-low trade frequency (3-6 trades) with high selectivity results in near-zero or minimal losses in flat/sideways markets - qwen3_235b and learning_qwen both achieved ~$0 PnL with only 3-4 trades vs massive losses from high-frequency traders

7dfb014d49fe.description: Index fund strategy of equal-weight allocation ($2000 per asset) with confidence 1.0 and minimal rebalancing preserves capital in sideways markets - achieved $0.00 PnL while active traders lost $1395

62db0d71ff3b.description: Passive holding without frequent position changes outperforms active trading when market moves are <0.1% - agents with <10 trades preserved capital while those with >100 trades lost $300-$580

c541468cd36b.description: High-confidence (0.85+) trades with multi-timeframe bullish/bearish alignment reasoning produce losses in flat markets - skill_aware_oss repeatedly opened positions with 0.85 confidence citing 'strong bullish alignment' yet lost $581

f20f019dfaad.description: Positive funding rate interpreted as bullish momentum signal leads to losses - llama4_scout repeatedly cited 'positive funding rate indicating potential upward momentum' while losing $326

abd1702d7f23.description: Conflicting directional signals on same asset within short timeframes indicates poor strategy - skill_aware_oss opened both long and short on BTCUSDT with same 0.85 confidence, showing signal unreliability

8b732a3af401.description: Mean-reversion strategies ('fading crowded longs', 'potential mean-reversion bounce') fail when market is truly flat with no significant deviation to revert from

e301e9a8b749.description: sideways_flat: Reduce trade frequency to <10 trades/day; passive index allocation outperforms active trading; avoid leveraged positions entirely; wait for clear directional breakout before engaging

61605d110d15.description: low_volatility_mixed: When all assets show <0.1% absolute movement, avoid opening new positions; fee drag exceeds potential profit; technical signals (SMA, MACD, multi-timeframe alignment) produce false signals in this regime

5d2a82fce004.description: sideways_flat: Mean-reversion and momentum strategies both fail; only capital preservation strategies (hold cash, minimal index allocation) succeed

671b830c4a8b.description: Limit trades to <10 per 24h period in flat/sideways markets (all assets <0.1% movement) to minimize fee drag and whipsaw losses

5a6322a24322.description: Position sizing at 2% risk with 2:1 reward ratio fails when market lacks trending behavior - this textbook approach requires directional movement to work

16d238e8c392.description: High confidence (>0.8) should require confirmation from actual price momentum (>0.5% move), not just technical indicator alignment

48192911d718.description: Avoid opening new positions when all major assets show <0.1% absolute movement - wait for volatility expansion

62c4337d6156.description: Trade count inversely correlates with performance in flat markets: 3-6 trades = ~$0 PnL, 70-180 trades = -$55 to -$141, 150-225 trades = -$325 to -$581

e27d335aa54f.description: Positive funding rate interpreted as bullish momentum is a losing signal - elevated funding indicates crowded longs vulnerable to liquidation, not strength

617151567977.description: SMA and MACD bearish signals for shorting fail when market is essentially flat (-0.02% BTC) - technical indicators need volatility to be meaningful

abd0ba7265c8.description: Cutting losses early when 'market seems to be consolidating' is appropriate risk management - llama4_scout's early exit reasoning was sound even if overall strategy failed

bbeb81b98c94.description: skill_aware_oss combines multi-timeframe analysis with strict risk validation and position scaling into existing winners. Uses 0.75-0.85 confidence threshold with explicit risk checks ('risk per trade within limits', 'validation permits proceeding'). Achieves highest PnL ($1349.11) with moderate trade frequency (157 trades).

7046b5fa926c.description: agentic_gptoss employs active loss-cutting strategy with high-confidence closes (0.9) on losing positions ('Close the losing ETHUSDT long to free margin'). Combines with selective long entries. Achieves $372.23 PnL with 182 trades.

37261605809c.description: Moderate trade frequency (120-200 trades) with disciplined position management outperforms both extremes. Winners trade 157-196 times vs losers at 248 trades or 2-4 trades.

c12f2416483b.description: Active closing of near-breakeven or small-loss positions to free margin for higher-conviction opportunities. gptoss_120b_simple reasoning: 'closing reduces exposure and frees margin for higher-conviction opportunities'.

b2a74b991038.description: In trending bull markets (+1.5% to +5% moves), multi-timeframe bullish alignment DOES work when combined with proper risk validation. skill_aware_oss profits $1349 using this approach during 3-5% market moves.

68487b67d293.description: Extreme overtrading (248 trades in 24h) with repetitive single-asset focus (SOLUSDT) despite asset underperforming market (+1.55% vs ETH +4.96%). llama4_scout lost $69.19 repeatedly opening SOLUSDT longs.

b3ab36d36571.description: High-confidence (0.8-0.9) entries based solely on 'strong uptrend' and 'high funding rate' without risk validation or position management leads to losses. llama4_scout used this reasoning 20+ times.

a35233e50f31.description: Ultra-low trade frequency (2-4 trades) misses trending market opportunities. qwen3_235b made only 4 trades during +3-5% market moves, losing $7.42. learning_qwen made 2 trades for $0 PnL.

3e31b42a7832.description: Focusing on weakest-performing asset (SOLUSDT +1.55%) while ignoring strongest movers (ETHUSDT +4.96%, DOGEUSDT +4.77%) destroys alpha. llama4_scout exclusively traded SOL.

4e9dd5519cc8.description: skill_only_oss without awareness component loses $69.20 with 26 trades, while skill_aware_oss gains $1349.11 with 157 trades. Awareness/validation layer is critical differentiator.

d239dc6358e0.description: Technical analysis baseline (ta_baseline) using traditional indicators loses $25.99 with only 18 trades in trending market. Pure TA without adaptive reasoning underperforms.

181329373082.description: trending_up: Multi-timeframe bullish alignment WITH risk validation and position scaling works in genuine uptrends (+3-5%). Moderate trade frequency (150-200) captures moves without overtrading. Focus on strongest movers (ETH, DOGE) not laggards (SOL).

c1ebc7a9515d.description: trending_up: Active loss management - closing losing positions quickly to free margin for winners. agentic_gptoss and gptoss_120b_simple both used this successfully.

0f52056e2d1f.description: trending_up: Asset selection matters: ETH (+4.96%) and DOGE (+4.77%) outperformed. Agents focusing on BTC (+3.14%) and SOL (+1.55%) captured less alpha.

a1514da28d82.description: moderate_bull: Zero-trade strategies (gpt_simple, index_fund) preserve capital but miss +3-5% opportunities. In confirmed uptrends, some participation is optimal.

f10fdc8a5104.description: Validate risk per trade explicitly before entry. skill_aware_oss reasoning includes 'risk per trade within limits' and 'portfolio risk is within limits' - this validation step correlates with +$1349 PnL.

1a3b3734e4fa.description: Close losing positions proactively with high confidence (0.9) to free margin. agentic_gptoss: 'closing frees margin and stops further loss' - correlates with +$372 PnL.

a1085bb88b09.description: Optimal trade frequency in trending markets: 120-200 trades/24h. Below 50 misses opportunities, above 200 creates fee drag and overtrading losses.

e84beff433bf.description: Diversify across assets rather than concentrating on single symbol. llama4_scout's SOL-only focus lost money despite bullish market.

7f93aac7c945.description: Position sizing at 25% equity limit per position (gptoss_20b_simple reasoning) requires active management to avoid concentration risk.

0e2bd85d7e70.description: Multi-timeframe bullish alignment (15m, 1h, 4h) combined with explicit risk validation produces profits in trending markets. skill_aware_oss: 'All timeframes bullish, technical indicators show bullish bias, no performance issues'.

aa22af21d3b5.description: High funding rate alone as bullish signal remains unreliable. llama4_scout repeatedly cited 'high funding rate indicating bullish momentum' but lost money.

b3925add25f2.description: Close positions near breakeven to free margin for higher-conviction trades. gptoss_120b_simple: 'position is near break-even...closing reduces exposure and frees margin'.

628d46a2b463.description: High-confidence (0.9) closes on losing positions to stop further loss. agentic_gptoss used this pattern successfully.

353e6b3db59e.description: Scaling into existing winning positions ('scaling into existing long positions') during confirmed trends captures additional alpha.

991585f4e33d.description: Multi-timeframe bullish alignment (15m, 1h, 4h) combined with explicit risk validation (2% risk, 2:1 reward ratio) and position sizing controls produces strong profits in trending markets. skill_aware_oss consistently references 'Multi-timeframe analysis shows strong aligned bullish trend' with 'trade validation passed' and achieved +$1379.66 PnL.

19b8b91370c9.description: Agentic workflow with validation checks before entry/exit decisions. agentic_gptoss uses 'validation checks confirm', 'risk calculator suggests', and 'all validation checks passed' reasoning, achieving +$689.63 with 184 trades. 70b6d3d39db5.description: Moderate trade frequency (120-200 trades/24h) in trending bull markets captures momentum while avoiding overtrading. gptoss_120b_simple (197 trades, +$138.86) and agentic_gptoss (184 trades, +$689.63) both fall in this range and are profitable.

041beecbda05.description: Proactive position closing to manage risk and free margin. Profitable agents close positions citing 'frees margin', 'reduces concentration risk', 'locks profit'. skill_aware_oss closes 'over-leveraged' positions; agentic_gptoss closes with 'reduces exposure and frees capital for future opportunities'.

928f977342e4.description: Asset diversification across multiple symbols rather than single-asset concentration. Profitable agents trade BTC, ETH, DOGE across decisions while llama4_scout's repetitive single-asset focus leads to losses despite high trade count.

348071070cdb.description: Extreme overtrading (248 trades in 24h) with high confidence (0.8-0.9) but shallow reasoning leads to losses. llama4_scout made 248 trades with -$18.95 PnL, using repetitive reasoning like 'showing strong upward trend' and 'high funding rate indicating potential for further growth' without validation checks.

8f8ae15ba45b.description: High funding rate interpreted as bullish momentum signal is unreliable. llama4_scout repeatedly cites 'high funding rate, indicating potential for further growth' but loses money. High funding actually indicates crowded long positioning and potential reversal risk.

f28479fb360b.description: Technical signals (SMA, MACD) without risk validation produce losses. skill_only_oss made 41 trades with -$77.63 PnL, likely using similar technical signals as skill_aware_oss but without the explicit risk validation layer that makes the difference.

2ec61fc73940.description: Traditional TA baseline approach without adaptive risk management loses in trending markets. ta_baseline made 21 trades with -$25.88 PnL while market was up 2.78-6.44% across all assets - failing to capture obvious uptrend.

c1d391f561a5.description: Zero-trade strategies miss significant opportunities in strong trending markets. index_fund and gpt_simple made 0 trades and $0 PnL while market gained 2.78-6.44%. In bull markets, inaction is a losing strategy relative to active participation.

3490c13b1c32.description: Very low trade frequency (<10 trades) with LLM-based agents suggests decision paralysis or overly conservative thresholds. learning_qwen (3 trades, $0) and qwen3_235b (4 trades, -$7.42) failed to capitalize on clear trending market.

cfe2d9d618bd.description: trending_up: Active trading with 120-200 trades/24h, multi-timeframe bullish alignment, explicit risk validation (2% risk, 2:1 reward), and proactive position management. skill_aware_oss (+$1379.66) and agentic_gptoss (+$689.63) demonstrate this approach works when market is up 2.78-6.44% across all assets.

5387d80de228.description: trending_up: Asset selection matters in bull markets: ETH (+6.44%) outperformed BTC (+4.14%) and SOL (+2.94%). Agents focusing on strongest performers (ETH, DOGE at +5.52%) captured more upside.

de4ca790fc89.description: Position sizing at 2% equity risk with 2:1 reward ratio fails in bearish markets lacking clear trend direction. skill_only_oss and skill_aware_oss both used this rule but still lost money.

0ea6132b1592.description: Trade frequency should adapt to market regime: bearish markets require <20 trades/day. Agents with 76-103 trades lost $44-$180 while agents with 0-11 trades lost $0-$40.

19b5d1f02ccc.description: Explicit validation step before trade execution improves outcomes. agentic_gptoss uses 'validation allows closing' and 'validation allows proceeding' language and was only profitable active trader.

9ab965269a03.description: Multi-timeframe bullish alignment (15m, 1h, 4h) as long entry signal FAILS in bearish markets. skill_only_oss used this for ETHUSDT longs while ETH declined -1.29%.

7bc35a56c778.description: Positive momentum on small timeframe (+0.33% to +0.44%) as long entry signal is UNRELIABLE. llama4_scout repeatedly cited 'positive momentum' for ETHUSDT longs, lost $151.

fcd0a9807e61.description: Close short positions when 'price below short-term SMAs' and 'position is already in profit' - agentic_gptoss used this to lock gains successfully.

0f47352be2bb.description: Close underwater longs when 'bearish bias' confirmed by validation. agentic_gptoss: 'ETH shows bearish bias and validation allows closing; lock in gains' - successful exit strategy.

cc116c3b4307.description: Multi-timeframe bearish alignment for short entry. skill_aware_oss: 'multi-timeframe analysis shows strong bearish alignment' for SOLUSDT short - directionally correct as SOL fell -1.15%.

d9f3f6e0f86d.description: Zero-trade strategies preserve capital in mixed/choppy markets. learning_qwen, gpt_simple, and index_fund made 0 trades and achieved $0.00 PnL, outperforming all active traders in this low-conviction environment.

633170e1f0c9.description: Minimal trading with high selectivity outperforms frequent trading. qwen3_235b made only 2 trades with PnL of -$0.29, dramatically outperforming agents with 140-201 trades.

2dff1f5265b9.description: Explicit risk validation with 2% equity risk and 2:1 reward ratio combined with position closing discipline. skill_only_oss achieved best active trader performance (-$17.96) with 160 trades, using validated risk parameters.

6f3351f49dd1.description: Close losing positions proactively with high confidence (0.8-0.9) to free margin and limit drawdowns. Multiple agents demonstrated this: gptoss_20b_simple closing SOL at -$4.76 loss, agentic_gptoss closing DOGE 'largest loss percentage'.

ce76cb2b0344.description: Extreme overtrading (200+ trades in 24h) in mixed/choppy markets leads to largest losses. skill_aware_oss made 201 trades with -$360.24 PnL, the worst performer.

a54b6891f4e4.description: Contrarian 'bounce back' reasoning on downtrending assets fails. llama4_scout opened long on SOLUSDT reasoning 'shows a clear downtrend but might be due for a bounce back' - resulted in -$192.40 total PnL.

cfc830995533.description: Multi-timeframe bearish alignment for shorts fails when market is mixed (BNB +0.93%, SOL +1.65% vs DOGE -1.19%). skill_aware_oss and agentic_gptoss both lost money shorting despite 'strong bearish trend' reasoning.

4d7705de6ffc.description: High confidence (0.85-0.9) short positions based on multi-timeframe bearish alignment underperform in mixed markets. agentic_gptoss shorted BNB at 0.85 confidence while BNB was +0.93%.

089e17c57d09.description: Anticipating breakouts on 'relatively stable' assets with small movements is unreliable. llama4_scout opened long on ETHUSDT expecting 'potential breakout' on -0.03% movement.

c0da9541a2f7.description: Negative funding rate interpreted as long opportunity signal is unreliable. llama4_scout: 'funding rate is slightly negative which could indicate a potential long opportunity' - total PnL -$192.40.

3d2f80a5fcae.description: mixed_choppy: Reduce or eliminate trading. In mixed markets (BNB +0.93%, SOL +1.65%, BTC -0.08%, ETH -0.03%, DOGE -1.19%), zero-trade strategies ($0 PnL) outperformed all active traders (all negative PnL). Trade frequency inversely correlates with performance: 0 trades = $0, 2 trades = -$0.29, 160 trades = -$17.96, 201 trades = -$360.24.

821b09058738.description: mixed_choppy: If trading, prefer assets showing clear directional movement (SOL +1.65%, BNB +0.93%) over flat assets (BTC -0.08%, ETH -0.03%). Avoid shorting in mixed regimes even with bearish technical signals.

9f7b54bbe224.description: mixed_choppy: Technical analysis signals (multi-timeframe alignment, MACD, SMA crossovers) generate false signals in mixed markets. Both bullish and bearish aligned trades lost money.

24871f723ccc.description: Trade frequency should adapt to market regime: mixed/choppy markets require 0-10 trades/24h maximum. 201 trades = -$360.24, 2 trades = -$0.29, 0 trades = $0.00.

25375c49ec68.description: Close positions near breakeven to free margin for higher-conviction trades. gptoss_20b_simple: 'ETH is down 0.55% with a small loss; closing the long position prevents further loss and frees margin'.

d500cd4baa4c.description: Validate risk per trade explicitly before entry with 2% equity risk and 2:1 reward ratio. skill_only_oss consistently applied this and achieved best active trader performance.

283204aaa3cb.description: Close losing positions proactively with high confidence (0.8-0.9) to free margin and limit drawdowns. Multiple agents demonstrated this pattern.

550cdce39bab.description: Explicit validation step ('Validate_trade cleared the trade') before execution improves outcomes. agentic_gptoss used this but still lost -$26.29, suggesting validation criteria need refinement for mixed markets.

3d42415ca106.description: Multi-timeframe bullish alignment (15m, 1h, 4h) as long entry signal FAILS in mixed/choppy markets. skill_only_oss repeatedly entered longs on ETH with 0.85-0.9 confidence citing bullish alignment, but ETH was -0.03%.

f7ab65b9c505.description: Multi-timeframe bearish alignment for short entry FAILS in mixed markets. agentic_gptoss: 'All timeframes align on a bearish trend' for DOGE short, skill_aware_oss: 'bearish bias' for SOL short - both lost money.

60c46481c7dc.description: Negative funding rate as long opportunity signal is UNRELIABLE. llama4_scout: 'funding rate is slightly negative which could indicate a potential long opportunity' - resulted in losses.

5a37d7b71509.description: Contrarian 'bounce back' reasoning on downtrending assets is a LOSING signal. llama4_scout: 'shows a clear downtrend but might be due for a bounce back'.

21ffea60b9ee.description: Close positions when 'no trend alignment and neutral indicators suggest exiting'. agentic_gptoss used this at 0.9 confidence - appropriate for mixed markets.

d1900b7edeb4.description: Close positions with largest loss percentage first to reduce overall portfolio loss. agentic_gptoss: 'DOGE short has the largest loss percentage... closing it reduces overall loss'.

a66f4194e3e8.description: Close positions to reduce overexposure to high-beta alts. skill_aware_oss: 'reduces overexposure to high-beta alts and aligns with neutral market sentiment'.

c2e2fbbdf11a.description: Zero-trade strategy preserves capital in moderately bullish markets where active trading leads to losses. Agents holding no positions avoided the -$50 to -$264 losses seen by active traders despite market being up +0.63% to +2.15%.

27ccaa364510.description: Low-frequency trading (89 trades) with selective long entries on multi-timeframe bullish alignment produces small positive returns (+$6.22) in moderately bullish markets.

f29a26c934f4.description: Closing long positions with high confidence (0.92) when regime shifts to 'moderate bearish' preserves capital. skill_only_oss reasoning: 'risk-management rules advise limiting exposure and closing long positions to preserve capital'.

920e99e68c8f.description: Extreme overtrading (231 trades in 24h) in moderately bullish market leads to largest losses (-$264.52). llama4_scout traded most frequently and lost most.

b3015c19ad28.description: Shorting in a bullish market (all assets +0.63% to +2.15%) with high frequency leads to significant losses. Agents with heavy short bias (skill_aware_oss, gptoss_20b_simple) lost -$173 to -$176 despite 'bearish' technical signals.

538c49bb8d53.description: Multi-timeframe bearish alignment signals for short entry FAIL in bullish markets. skill_aware_oss opened shorts on 'bearish bias (RSI overbought, MACD bearish)' but market moved up, causing -$173.25 loss.

4b4d988cd843.description: High-confidence short entries (0.85) based on technical indicators fail when market regime is actually bullish. Agents misread regime as bearish when BTC was +0.63%, ETH +1.15%, SOL +1.60%.

54685e8a16bf.description: Churning behavior - repeatedly opening and closing same positions (BTCUSDT, SOLUSDT shorts) destroys capital through fees and slippage. skill_aware_oss showed this pattern explicitly.

96619900d56d.description: Position sizing at 25% equity with 5x leverage on directionally wrong trades amplifies losses. gptoss_20b_simple lost -$175.85 with 131 trades.

3df112a75fba.description: moderate_bull: Zero trading or very low frequency (<30 trades/24h) with long-only bias. Market up +0.63% to +2.15% across all assets - passive strategies outperformed all active traders. Only skill_only_oss with 89 trades and selective longs achieved positive PnL.

9432a4f77ff5.description: moderate_bull: Avoid shorting entirely. All short-biased strategies lost money despite 'bearish' technical signals. Technical indicators gave false bearish readings in a bullish regime.

3ed5d51204d4.description: moderate_bull: Asset selection: BNB (+2.15%) significantly outperformed BTC (+0.63%). Long positions in higher-beta assets would have captured more upside.

86ce05212674.description: Trade frequency should adapt to market regime: moderate bull markets require 0-30 trades/24h maximum. Above 100 trades correlates with losses (-$50 to -$264).

30310e25755c.description: Close short positions immediately when market shows consistent positive returns across all assets. Holding shorts in +1-2% market destroys capital.

186df825d306.description: Explicit validation step before trade execution does NOT prevent losses if regime assessment is wrong. agentic_gptoss used validation but still lost -$50.58.

ab5db737cffa.description: Close losing positions proactively with high confidence (0.8-0.9) to free margin - CONFIRMED but insufficient alone. gptoss_120b_simple closed losing BNB shorts but still ended -$75.96.

151d3979c854.description: 2% equity risk with 2:1 reward ratio fails when directionally wrong. skill_aware_oss used this framework but lost -$173.25 on wrong-direction shorts.

39c0c7e83ecb.description: Multi-timeframe bullish alignment (15m, 1h, 4h) as long entry signal WORKS in moderate bull markets. skill_only_oss: 'Current regime likely trending up; active multi-timeframe bullish alignment with 2% equity risk' - only profitable active trader.

253b6514bfcf.description: Multi-timeframe bearish alignment for short entry FAILS in moderate bull markets. skill_aware_oss: 'Technical indicators show bearish bias (RSI overbought, MACD bearish)' led to -$173 loss.

aec5acd02d59.description: Close long positions when 'regime shifts to moderate bearish' - WORKS for capital preservation. skill_only_oss: 'risk-management rules advise limiting exposure and closing long positions'.

37d971d58edb.description: Close short positions when 'BNB short is the only losing position' to limit further loss - PARTIALLY WORKS but too late if regime is bullish.

d32d6adeba37.description: RSI overbought + MACD bearish as short entry signal is UNRELIABLE in moderate bull markets. These signals triggered shorts that lost money as market continued higher.

9fd4ee3a05ba.description: Zero-trade strategy in moderate bull markets preserves capital perfectly. Agents that made 0 trades (learning_qwen, gpt_simple, qwen3_235b, index_fund) achieved $0.00 PnL while all active traders lost money despite BNB +2.03%, ETH +1.02%, DOGE +1.07% gains.

42011239de14.description: Minimal trading frequency (23 trades) with technical analysis baseline outperforms high-frequency approaches. ta_baseline lost only $-28.69 vs llama4_scout's $-229.00 with 243 trades.

6b8254a644a8.description: Proactive closing of losing positions with high confidence (0.85-0.95) to free margin. skill_only_oss closed DOGEUSDT at 0.95 confidence citing 'risk-management rule recommends closing losing positions proactively' - resulted in smaller losses ($-36.63) than more active traders.

b090c5d9c6a5.description: Extreme overtrading (243 trades in 24h) in moderate bull market leads to largest losses. llama4_scout made 243 trades with $-229.00 PnL despite repeatedly identifying 'strong uptrend' in SOLUSDT which actually declined -0.09%.

beea435826c2.description: Repeated high-confidence long entries on SOLUSDT based on 'strong uptrend' reasoning while asset actually declined -0.09%. llama4_scout opened multiple longs at 0.80-0.90 confidence citing +2.24% to +2.59% price increases that were temporary.

3eba96cb9f91.description: Shorting in moderate bull markets leads to consistent losses. skill_aware_oss opened shorts on BTCUSDT at 0.88 confidence citing 'strong bearish alignment' while BTC was +0.24% - contributed to $-167.78 total loss.

47f569d6ca69.description: Multi-timeframe bearish alignment signals for short entry fail in moderate bull markets. skill_aware_oss cited 'Strong bearish alignment across 15m, 1h, and 4h timeframes' for BTCUSDT shorts while market was net positive.

881589d0571d.description: moderate_bull: Zero trading or extremely low frequency (<25 trades/24h). Market showed BNB +2.03%, ETH +1.02%, DOGE +1.07%, BTC +0.24% but all active traders lost money. Only non-traders preserved capital. If trading, long-only on strongest performers (BNB).

289fba29d27f.description: moderate_bull: Avoid shorting entirely. skill_aware_oss lost $-167.78 with 171 trades including BTCUSDT shorts despite 'bearish alignment' signals. Market direction trumps technical signals.

18c1ea64eb08.description: moderate_bull: Asset selection critical: BNB (+2.03%) significantly outperformed SOL (-0.09%). Agents focusing on SOL longs (llama4_scout) lost heavily despite 'uptrend' reasoning.

4823a485e95b.description: moderate_bull: Technical analysis signals (multi-timeframe alignment, MACD, RSI) are unreliable for direction. Both bullish and bearish technical signals led to losses.

c61e4c3ceede.description: Trade frequency should adapt to market regime: moderate bull markets require 0-25 trades/24h maximum. ta_baseline (23 trades, -$28.69) vs llama4_scout (243 trades, -$229.00).

8a1f893153e7.description: Position sizing at 2% equity risk with 2:1 reward ratio fails when directionally wrong. skill_aware_oss used this framework but lost $-167.78 by shorting in bull market.
